verses.name: Luke 19:39
verses.text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him, Master, rebuke thy disciples.

verses.name: Luke 19:40
verses.text: And he answered and said unto them, I tell you that, if these should hold their peace, the stones would immediately cry out.

verses.name: Luke 19:41
verses.text: And when he was come near, he beheld the city, and wept over it,

verses.name: Luke 19:42
verses.text: Saying, If thou hadst known, even thou, at least in this thy day, the things which belong unto thy peace! but now they are hid from thine eyes.
